channel.title: [Delta] GalaxyScape - Progress Thread
channel.description:
[center][img]http://galaxyscape.netii.net/homeimages/toplogo.png[/img][/center]
[size=8pt]Hey guys this is the progress thread for GalaxyScape, if you would like to join the team please go here instead: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,570143.msg4132389.html#msg4132389]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,570143.msg4132389.html#msg4132389[/url][/size]
[b]THIS IS NOT A REMAKE, THIS IS A PK SERVER![/b]
[b]Progress:[/b]
________________________________________________________________________________________________________
*Red: Means the feature has not yet been started. *Teal: Means the feature has been started, and is under construction. *Green: Means the feature has been fully completed. ________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[img]http://i.imgur.com/O6Gaa.gif[/img] [b]Combat (In General)[/b] *New combat system *Working PVP (Needs quite a bit of work) *PVN Working (It is working okay, but could use a few tweaks)
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205044856/runescape/images/archive/5/51/20101104013324!Attack-icon.png[/img] [b]Attack[/b] *Fully working attack leveling
[img]http://i372.photobucket.com/albums/oo165/Irish_Talent/Runescape%20Icons/defence_icon.gif[/img] [b]Defence[/b] *Fully working defence leveling
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305005003/runescape/images/archive/3/3e/20110305042835!Strength-icon.png[/img] [b]Strength[/b] *Fully working strength leveling
[img]http://www.zybez.net/img/genimg/gettingstart/quests.gif[/img] [b]Quests[/b] [i]*I will work on this part when we get some more quests working, and test them out.[/i] ________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[u][b]Pictures of Content:[/b][/u]
[b]Edgeville:[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/4EzWd.png[/img]
[b]Quests:[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Q0XhT.png[/img]
[b]Wilderness Levels:[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/PTfgF.png[/img]

item.title: [Delta] GalaxyScape - Progress Thread
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:18, topic:465248”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=570152.msg4133324#msg4133324 date=1351400824]

People underestimate it’s power.
[/quote]what power? anything wL based is shit, has been shit, and always will be shit. i’ve seen a very few amounts of server development where i say to myself, “wow, this could actually go somewhere” on a DeltaScape project thread. guess how many lived up to their expectations… none. not one single project that i’ve ever seen in the entire history of DeltaScape has actually made even decent progression with that unbearable source. you want to make change in Delta? i can very well assume it’s not going to happen.

DalaCity?[/quote]
He’s talking about networking, player updating etcetera…

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] GalaxyScape - Progress Thread
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:17, topic:465248”][quote author=Ian1045 link=topic=570152.msg4132486#msg4132486 date=1351285981]
People underestimate it’s power.
[/quote]what power? anything wL based is shit, has been shit, and always will be shit. i’ve seen a very few amounts of server development where i say to myself, “wow, this could actually go somewhere” on a DeltaScape project thread. guess how many lived up to their expectations… none. not one single project that i’ve ever seen in the entire history of DeltaScape has actually made even decent progression with that unbearable source. you want to make change in Delta? i can very well assume it’s not going to happen.[/quote]
This is very true, I’ve tried like, 3 delta/wL projects and I got tired of all of them and failed, maybe when I’m more experienced I’ll try again but for now I’m good with RuneSource. I hated working with Delta. It was just months of cleaning crappy code, then once I would clean it I wouldn’t be able to login or there would be some other bug.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled

[quote=“arham 4, post:18, topic:465248”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=570152.msg4133324#msg4133324 date=1351400824]

[/quote]what power? anything wL based is shit, has been shit, and always will be shit. i’ve seen a very few amounts of server development where i say to myself, “wow, this could actually go somewhere” on a DeltaScape project thread. guess how many lived up to their expectations… none. not one single project that i’ve ever seen in the entire history of DeltaScape has actually made even decent progression with that unbearable source. you want to make change in Delta? i can very well assume it’s not going to happen.

DalaCity?[/quote]lol, no.

item.title: [Delta] GalaxyScape - Progress Thread
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:18, topic:465248”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=570152.msg4133324#msg4133324 date=1351400824]

People underestimate it’s power.
[/quote]what power? anything wL based is shit, has been shit, and always will be shit. i’ve seen a very few amounts of server development where i say to myself, “wow, this could actually go somewhere” on a DeltaScape project thread. guess how many lived up to their expectations… none. not one single project that i’ve ever seen in the entire history of DeltaScape has actually made even decent progression with that unbearable source. you want to make change in Delta? i can very well assume it’s not going to happen.

DalaCity?[/quote]
Nope. He is referring to the way wL servers are driven. They all have the same player/npc updating, and either the same networking, or some wrongly implemented networking. I myself, and others have tried to “clean up” a wL based server, but the only thing that ends up happening is eventually it’s not even the same base.

Read full topic

I chose delta, mostly because I feel comfortable with it. People underestimate it’s power.
[/quote]

item.title: [Delta] GalaxyScape - Progress Thread
item.dc:creator: @Ian1045 Ian1045
item.description:
@Ian1045 wrote:

[center][/center]

[size=8pt]Hey guys this is the progress thread for GalaxyScape, if you would like to join the team please go here instead:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,570143.msg4132389.html#msg4132389[/size]

THIS IS NOT A REMAKE, THIS IS A PK SERVER!

Progress:

*Red: Means the feature has not yet been started.
*Teal: Means the feature has been started, and is under construction.
*Green: Means the feature has been fully completed.

Combat (In General)
*New combat system
*Working PVP (Needs quite a bit of work)
*PVN Working (It is working okay, but could use a few tweaks)

Attack
*Fully working attack leveling

Defence
*Fully working defence leveling

Strength
*Fully working strength leveling

Quests
*I will work on this part when we get some more quests working, and test them out.

Pictures of Content:

Edgeville:

4EzWd.png764×503

Quests:

Q0XhT.png765×503

Wilderness Levels:

PTfgF.png765×502

Read full topic
